entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @DonaldJTrumpJr With all the precautions the white house has taken, they still have the coronavirus. Yet the trump administration wants American tax payers to return to work, with minimal precautions. Why are they trying to kill us? We pay the bills.
